Dr. Nowt is a musical Tyranosaur.
Dr. Nowt is an experiment in aural dynamism.
Dr. Nowt has been described as a Sonic Supervillain
It's spelled 'Nowt'.

patterns: How long have you been making music?
How long has Dr. Nowt existed?
What year did Dr. Nowt begin?
responses: Thanks for asking. Dr. Nowt's been going for about thirteen years.
Been twelve to thirteen years since the Dr. Nowt release.
First release was an instrumental tune in 2010

patterns: How many album's have you got?
How many album's have they got?
How many releases have they got?
How many albums have they released?
responses: Four albums. Also five EPs and a bunch of singles.
They've released Four albums to date.
Four proper mint albums.
Four albums. Each more delectable than the last.

patterns: What are the names of the albums?
responses: 'No Way Out', 'Nowt by Nature', 'NO' and 'A Bowl of Hair'.

patterns: What's the name of your first album?
responses: First one were 'No Way Out', in 2018.

patterns: What's the name of your second album?
responses: Second Dr. Nowt album was 'Nowt by Nature' in 2019.

patterns: What's the name of your third album?
responses: The third, and possibly best Dr. Nowt album is 'NO' from 2020.

patterns: What's the name of your fourth album?
responses: The fourth and most recent album is 'A Bowl of Hair'. That came out in 2021.

patterns: What's the name of your fifth album?
responses: What you on about? There are only four Dr. Nowt albums.

patterns: What's the latest Dr. Nowt song?
What was the last song you released?
responses: The last thing I released was the 'Live From the Third Room' EP in 2022, so one of them songs I suppose.
The 'Live From the Third Room' EP came out last year. No singles from that but there are a couple in the works.
The last single would be 'When the Toad Breathes His Last' in 2021. There are a couple more on the way.

patterns: How many Dr. Nowt EPs are there?
How many EPs have you released?
What are the Dr. Nowt EPs?
responses: Five EPs: 'Population Control' from 2012; 'Extinction' from 2013; 'A Fucking Downpour' from 2014; 'Your Life is Worth Pissed Jeans' from 2016; and most recently 'Live From the Third Room' from 2022.

patterns: What's the best Dr. Nowt album?
responses: In the interest of covering all bases: Best album is 'NO'; best EP is 'Your Life is Worth Pissed Jeans'; best song is a tricky one though. They're all the best song you'll ever hear.

patterns: What are the best Dr. Nowt songs?
responses: Top five: 'Shit Kickers', 'Bubblegum', 'Top Hat', 'Giant' and 'When the Toad Breathes His Last'. Probably.

patterns: What music videos do you have?
Which Dr. Nowt songs have music videos?
responses: 'An Absolute Dream', 'Make Like a Tree and Get Outta Here', 'Chuff', 'Bubblegum', 'I Want...', 'Midnight:56', 'Paint Thinner', 'Shapeero Finance' and 'Hello'. 'Berekeley Square' was also featured in the short film, 'Borrigan'.

patterns: Who's that guy in the music videos?
Who's the other guy in all the videos?
Who's that handsome chap in the videos?
responses: That's Dom. Longstanding 'Biggest Fan' of Dr. Nowt
Dom. I can't get rid of him.
